divs: Sighting Details I SAW THIS SLIM SILVER COLORED OBJECT WHEN I WAS DRIVING ON GILLHAM RD ANDLINWOOD GILLHAM IS NORTH BOUND LINWOOD IS EAST WEST GILLHAM ALSO IS BOTHNORTH AND SOUTH BOUND . BUT I WAS TRAVELING NORTH BOUND ON GILLHAM IN KANSASCITY,MO -IN -THE -MIDTOWN DISTRICT OF KANSAS CITY-IT WAS A BRIGHT SUNNYDAY AND A COLD SATURDAY AT 1300 HOURS100PM.I SAW THIS OBJECT PASS INFRONT A TV TOWER FORMLY TV 5 TOWER TV 19 TOWER THIS IS THE TALLEST TV TOWERIN THE USA PLUS THIS THING UFO WAS ABOUT 12 WAS UP THE TOWER FAR ASHEIGHT THE UFO WAS 2 - OR- 3 MILES DISTANCE FROM THE TOWER BUT IT PASSED INFRONT OF THE TOWER .ALSO I WATCHED THE OBJECT AND SAW IT LOOKED LIKE AAIRFORCE OR AIRFORCES TYPE OF FIGHTER PLAN WAS 2-3-MILES AWAY FROM THEUFO AND 5,000 FEET ABOVE THE UFO .THE UFO AT A SUPER HIGH RATE OF SPEED TOOKOFF AND WAS GONE SO FAST I HAD TO THINK ABOUT WHAT I HAD JUST SAW IN THE SKY.JAMES,ALLEN,TUTT,JR MUFON FIELD INVESTIGATOR I.D. 7606KANSAS CITY MISSOURI
Summary: ufo sighting over kansas city,mo-slim silver -obje
